properties.Title: Base Housing Requirment
properties.UserDescription: This law enforces a base housing requirment scaling based on the week. Week 2 is 20. Week 3 is 30. Week 4 is 40. This law does not take effect until 168 hours after the citizens first login.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Message: You require a base housing value of at least 10 * the current week of the cycle.

properties.Title: Base Food Subtotal Requirment
properties.UserDescription: This law enforces a base food subtotal on everyone with it scaling based on the week of the cycle. Week 2 - 20. Week 3 - 25. Week 4 - 35. This law does not take effect untill 168 hours after the citizens first login.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Message: You need a base subtotal nutritiona amount scaling by the week of the cycle. Week 2 - 25. Week 3 - 30. Week 4 - 35.

properties.Title: Base Nutrition Requirment
properties.UserDescription: This law enforces a somewhat balance diet by requirering at least 10% of your nutrients come from carbs, vitamins, proteins, and fat. This law only applies after the first week.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Message: You need to have at least 10% in each nutrition category (Carb, Vitamins, Protein, Fat).
